subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Declining attendance and lackluster play prompted the Wild owner to lavish identical 13-year, $98 million contracts on the high-profile free agents Zach Parise and Ryan Suter.
snippet: Declining attendance and lackluster play prompted the Wild owner to lavish identical 13-year, $98 million contracts on the high-profile free agents Zach Parise and Ryan Suter.
